DataElement.preferredName: Oncotype DX Breast Recurrence Score Result Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number between 0-100, based on the results of Oncotype DX breast cancer assay, that assesses the 9-year risk of distant recurrence in node-negative patients, 5-year distant recurrence or mortality in node-positive patients, and the likelihood that chemotherapy will benefit the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Oncotype DX Breast Recurrence Score Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A number between 0-100, based on the results of Oncotype DX breast cancer assay, that assesses the 9-year risk of distant recurrence in node-negative patients, 5-year distant recurrence or mortality in node-positive patients, and the likelihood that chemotherapy will benefit the patient._The result of an action.

Property.preferredDefinition: A phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.
